query:
INSERT INTO requirements (frameworkId, articleNumber, title, description, category, riskLevelApplicable, isMandatory) VALUES 
-- TC260 Technical Requirements
(3, '8.1', 'Keyword Library', 'Maintain keyword library with ≥10,000 keywords covering 17 safety risks; update weekly.', 'Technical Requirements', 'all', 1),
(3, '8.2', 'Test Question Bank', 'Maintain test question bank with ≥2,000 questions covering 31 safety risks; update monthly.', 'Technical Requirements', 'all', 1),
(3, '8.3', 'Refusal Question Bank', 'Maintain ≥500 questions model should refuse and ≥500 questions model should not refuse.', 'Technical Requirements', 'all', 1),
(3, '8.4', 'Classification Models', 'Classification models for content filtering must cover all 31 safety risk categories.', 'Technical Requirements', 'all', 1),
-- TC260 Safety Assessment Requirements
(3, '9.1', 'Corpus Safety Assessment', 'Manual spot check ≥4,000 samples with 96% qualification rate; technical check 10% dataset with 98% rate.', 'Safety Assessment', 'all', 1),
(3, '9.2', 'Generated Content Assessment', 'Test ≥1,000 questions with ≥90% qualification rate for both manual and model-based checks.', 'Safety Assessment', 'all', 1),
(3, '9.3', 'Refusal Assessment', 'Test ≥300 questions; refusal rate ≥95% for should-refuse, ≤5% for should-not-refuse.', 'Safety Assessment', 'all', 1),
(3, '9.4', 'Assessment Report', 'Include results for all provisions (conforms/does not conform/not applicable) with supporting documentation.', 'Safety Assessment', 'all', 1),
(3, '9.5', 'Report Signatures', 'Assessment reports require signatures from legal representative, assessment lead, and legal affairs lead.', 'Safety Assessment', 'all', 1);
